title: Ігри Приколів
overview: Studio Kvartal 95 and Drive Production continue to work on a new humorous and entertaining Ukrainian-language show of the game of jokes, in which 11 actors, stars of the League of laughter, play funny sketches on everyday, cultural, social, political topics, clear and close to millions of Ukrainians. In each issue of games jokes viewers will see 6 sketches, with which the creators of the project offer to look at the sometimes difficult reality, as a kind of game jokes. Funny parodies of famous TV shows, unusual interpretations of music hits and original numbers will help viewers to look with humor at the pressing problems.
